title: Crossroads
description: Cece, sort for Chloe Cross, has been on the run so long that she has build her whole life around it. She imagined her life completely different, but learned to adapt quickly in order to keep the people that she loves safe. At the insistence of her current boss, she goes for a job interview at Stone Security, a private investigation firm. There she meets Alex Stone, the owner of the company and close friend of her employer. The forbidden lust and mystery that surrounds him and his job offer, instantly intrigues her.Will she risk it all for the life she wished she had, and take the job before her past catch up to her? Will she let herself finally fall in love, while unraveling the enigma that is called Alex Stone? Or will she get burned like the scar on her back by his molten green eyes?
author: L. Kroese
